version_description:
• Edit Alerts
• Interface Improvements
• Bug fixes

• Long press on chart to create alerts.
• New chart price markers.
• Spanish localization.
Stability improvements.
Bug fixes and improvements.

• New chart bars periods: 4 days, week, 2 weeks and month
• Add notes to your alerts
• Support for iOS 11
• Bug fixes & optimizations
Bug fixes and improvements.
Support for alert notes in push notifications.

• Support for iPhone X
• Portuguese localization
• Bug fixes and improvements
• Bug fixes and improvements
• Persistent alerts
• Customizable sound & color for alerts
• Saving & sharing chart image

• 24h trading volume on chart screen
• Sort search results by exchange/pair/price/volume

• Drawing horizontal and vertical lines
• Ad-Free subscription

• Drawing horizontal and vertical lines
• Ad-Free subscription
• Bug fixes and improvements
• Bug fixes and improvements
• Bug fixes and improvements

• iPad Support
• User profile (keep your watchlists, chart settings, drawings and indicators in the cloud)
• Indicators
• Ruler (measure price change and trading volume)
• Heikin Ashi chart type
• Bar Close Countdown
• Local Min & Max
• Draw rectangle shapes
• Shapes list (edit order, coordinates, style, visibility, title)
• Chart layers (visibility of your alerts, shapes and indicators)
• Organize your chart with Layouts (indicators, timeframe, scale, visibility, chart type)
